io.micronaut.inject.annotation

Class DefaultAnnotationMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.inject.annotation.DefaultAnnotationMetadata
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotationMetadata, Cloneable, AnnotatedElement

    @Internal
public class DefaultAnnotationMetadata
extends Object
implements AnnotationMetadata, AnnotatedElement, Cloneable
    Default implementation of AnnotationMetadata.

    NOTE: Although required to be public This is an internal class and should not be referenced directly in user code

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

      • DefaultAnnotationMetadata

        @Internal
public DefaultAnnotationMetadata(@Nullable
                                           Map<String,Map<CharSequence,Object>> declaredAnnotations,
                                           @Nullable
                                           Map<String,Map<CharSequence,Object>> declaredStereotypes,
                                           @Nullable
                                           Map<String,Map<CharSequence,Object>> allStereotypes,
                                           @Nullable
                                           Map<String,Map<CharSequence,Object>> allAnnotations,
                                           @Nullable
                                           Map<String,Set<String>> annotationsByStereotype)
        This constructor is designed to be used by compile time produced subclasses.
        Parameters:
        declaredAnnotations - The directly declared annotations
        declaredStereotypes - The directly declared stereotypes
        allStereotypes - All of the stereotypes
        allAnnotations - All of the annotations
        annotationsByStereotype - The annotations by stereotype
